name: voicer
description:
Voicer is a browser plugin that brings your selected web text to life through speech. With Voicer, simply highlight any text on a webpage, right-click, and select the “Read this” option from the context menu. Within moments, Voicer converts the chosen text into natural-sounding speech and presents a sleek playback interface at the bottom of your screen.
By clicking the play button in the interface, you can listen to the text being read aloud, providing a seamless and efficient way to consume web content audibly.
